title: X Factor: Celebrity's Jenny Ryan hits back at claims she 'mimed'
text:
X Factor: Celebrity contestant Jenny Ryan has shot down claims that she was miming during last night’s episode.

The Chase quizzer, aka The Vixen, performed her own take on Conchita Wurst’s Eurovision winning song, Rise Like A Phoenix, in front of judges Simon Cowell, Louis Walsh and Nicole Scherzinger for the first of the live shows.

Jenny’s vocals were so impressive that the panelists couldn’t get enough and Nicole branded it ‘ruthless and roofless because you blew the roof off’.

On top of that, many audiences called for her to sing the next James Bond theme tune as she landed a Safe Chair.

Sadly though, Jenny’s sensational vocals caused some to become suspicious on social media, with conspiracy theorists asking: ‘Was Jenny Ryan miming?’

Luckily, Jenny was on hand to shut down the haters and explained that she has actually been gifted with the voice of an actual angel.

Jenny Ryan wowed the judges with her performance last night (Picture: Rex)

‘I was not miming,’ she wrote. ‘The performance was live. I refer you to the hundreds of people in the studio who can attest.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Jenny added: ‘Perhaps check the sound settings on your television set if they are not in sync with visuals.’

Oh, snap.

Last night’s show saw 13 acts take to the stage in a bid to win a coveted record deal with Syco.

After everyone had performed, chat show host Ricki Lake was eliminated by the public after they voted.

Love Actually child star Olivia Olson was also kicked out of the competition with Simon Cowell having the deciding vote and choosing to save Martin Bashir instead.

The actress was left in floods of tears at the decision, while the audience greeted it with a volley of boos – and Dermot O’Leary attempted to console her.

‘With you, you know what, you have been embraced, and I know you are going home but I have heard your stuff and you have some great original stuff, I’ve heard it out there on Spotify,’ he said.

‘Use this as a springboard and we wish you all the very best of luck.’

X Factor: Celebrity continues Saturday at 8.30pm on ITV.

description: X Factor: Celebrity's Jenny Ryan hits back at claims she 'mimed' last night during the live show.
